statements: SELECT id, name, organization, expertise, email FROM digital_literacy_experts;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE organization = 'TechNerds';
SELECT name, expertise FROM digital_literacy_experts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise = 'Cybersecurity' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organization FROM digital_literacy_experts;
SELECT name, organization FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE organization = 'Tech Academy' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise LIKE '%cyber%' AND organization = 'Cyber Institute' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, expertise FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE name LIKE 'John%' AND organization = 'Tech Skills' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise = 'Digital Marketing' OR organization = 'Tech Academy' ORDER BY organization, name;
SELECT id, name, expertise, email FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise IN ('Coding', 'Data Analysis') ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts
SELECT expert_id, name, expertise_area FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY expert_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT expertise_area FROM digital_literacy_experts
SELECT * FROM collaboration_opportunities WHERE posted_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY posted_date ASC
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description, posted_by FROM collaboration_opportunities
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise_area = 'Cybersecurity';
SELECT name, location FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND expert_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_opportunities WHERE posted_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description FROM collaboration_opportunities WHERE posted_by LIKE 'John%';
SELECT name, location, email FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise_area = 'Data Science' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM experts WHERE expertise_area = 'Technology';
SELECT expert_id, name FROM experts WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT org_name, industry FROM organizations WHERE industry = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT expert_id, org_id, connection_date FROM connections WHERE expert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE expert_id = 1;
SELECT org_name, industry FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT expert_id, name, expertise_area FROM experts WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT org_name, COUNT(connection_id) AS total_connections FROM organizations JOIN connections ON organizations.org_id = connections.org_id GROUP BY org_name ORDER BY total_connections DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts;
SELECT full_name, email FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise_area='Digital Marketing';
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, years_of_experience FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type='Professional';
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts
SELECT full_name, expertise_area FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE years_of_experience > 5
SELECT expert_id, full_name, expertise_area FROM digital_literacy_experts ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type = 'Mentorship'
SELECT c.project_name, e.full_name FROM collaborations c JOIN digital_literacy_experts e ON c.collaborator_id = e.expert_id
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts;
SELECT name, expertise FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE organization = 'Tech Corp';
SELECT project_name, description FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaboration_id, project_id, expert_id, collaboration_type FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_id DESC;
SELECT meeting_date, location, agenda FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_literacy_experts;
SELECT name, expertise, organization FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE expertise = 'Education';
SELECT project_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT expert_id, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type IN ('Research', 'Consulting');
SELECT skill_name, description FROM skills ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
